New Records: Yuki Kawamura scored an NBA career-high 10 points
Key Match Events: Oklahoma City Thunder defeated Memphis Grizzlies 130-106
Post-Match Reflections: Yuki Kawamura reflected on a tumultuous year of basketball
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 35 points and had 7 assists
Others: The Memphis Grizzlies sit second in the NBA's Western Conference with 22 wins and 11 losses
